name: KIRAN Society
briefDescription: KIRAN is a nonprofit making organisation working in the field of disability and development. Since 1990, we are serving for children & youngsters with different abilities in the north India. We are rehabilitating them through inclusive education, physical rehabilitation, vocational training and providing different livelihood oppertunity to them and their parents. More than 450 children are getting education and other rehabilitation service at KIRAN campus on regular basis. Through CBR and Outreach program, we are reaching through 6000 children in Bihar and Uttar Pradesh.
